Removal of roof over front lightwell, installing roof light over extension built in 1966 and installing 1no skylight to main roof. Creating new
openings to stud wall. Demolition of un-original staircase. Removal of plastic drainage pipes from front fa√ßade. Application: HGY/2022/2556 and HGY/2024/0074 - Approval of details.
description: Listed building consent for structural works to install a steel at LGF level to support the spine wall above and works to then reinstate masonry wall below. Reinstatement of a hearth at LGF level. Reinstatement of the LGF partition wall between front room and hallway and associated door where opening has been made. Removal of a modern fireplace surround at 1st floor level and boarding over the fireplace opening. Installation of a bathroom extractor fan. Strengthening works to the roof involving installation of new steels above the 2nd floor ceiling and associated padstones. Works to reinstate ceilings, mouldings and wall finishes to areas affected by these works.
